required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: DYsphagiA in interMedIate Care UnitS - a Retrospective Analysis of Available Data

brief_summary.textblock: Retrospective study in intermediate care unit patients on the incidence, Risk factors, and effects on mortality of dysphagia. During a 6-month observational period, routine data will be collected and analysed.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of positive screening (first screening) for dysphagia in neurosurgical intermediate care unit patients
primary_outcome.time_frame: within 8 hours from intermediate care unit admission
primary_outcome.description: incidence: percentage of patients with screening positivity at first screening

intervention.intervention_name: Screening for dysphagia along clinical routine
intervention.description: Screening for dysphagia using the water swallow test in intermediate care unit patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Intermediate care unit patients admitted within the observational period
Exclusion Criteria:
- documented refusal to General Consent

reference.citation: Zuercher P, Moret CS, Dziewas R, Schefold JC. Dysphagia in the intensive care unit: epidemiology, mechanisms, and clinical management. Crit Care. 2019 Mar 28;23(1):103. doi: 10.1186/s13054-019-2400-2. Review.

Schefold JC, Berger D, ZÃ¼rcher P, Lensch M, Perren A, Jakob SM, Parviainen I, Takala J. Dysphagia in Mechanically Ventilated ICU Patients (DYnAMICS): A Prospective Observational Trial. Crit Care Med. 2017 Dec;45(12):2061-2069. doi: 10.1097/CCM.0000000000002765.
